    function loadCSS(href, before, media) {
      var ss = window.document.createElement("link");
      var ref = before || window.document.getElementsByTagName("meta")[0];
      var sheets = window.document.styleSheets;
      ss.rel = "stylesheet";
      ss.href = href.trim();
      ss.media = "only x";
      ref.parentNode.appendChild(ss, ref);
      function toggleMedia() {
        var defined;
        for (var i = 0; i < sheets.length; i++) {
          if (sheets[i].href && sheets[i].href.indexOf(href.trim().substr(-8)) > -1) {
            defined = true;
          }
        }
        if (defined) {
          ss.media = media || "all";
        }
        else {
          setTimeout(toggleMedia);
        }
      }

      toggleMedia();
      return ss;
    }

    window.loadCSS = loadCSS;
    </script><script>
    function loadJs(src) {
      var ref = window.document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
      var script = window.document.createElement("script");
      script.src = src;
      script.defer = 1;
      ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script, ref);
      return script;
    }
    window.loadJs = loadJs

    function whenAvailable(name, callback, ms) {
      const interval = ms ? ms : 15; // ms
      var timeout = window.setTimeout(function () {
        if (window[name]) {
          window.clearTimeout(timeout);
          callback(window[name]);
        } else {
          window.setTimeout(arguments.callee, interval);
        }
      }, interval);
    }
    window.whenAvailable = whenAvailable;

    const volatilityScore = quote => {
  if (quote) {
    return calculateVolatility(quote?.highValue, quote?.lowValue, quote?.previousPriceValue);
  }

  return '';
}
    const getVolatilityTargeting = n => {
  if (n >= 0.0 && n < 0.25) return 'volatility000';
  if (n >= 0.25 && n < 0.5) return 'volatility025';
  if (n >= 0.5 && n < 0.75) return 'volatility050';
  if (n >= 0.75 && n < 1.0) return 'volatility075';
  if (n >= 1.0 && n < 1.25) return 'volatility100';
  if (n >= 1.25 && n < 1.5) return 'volatility125';
  if (n >= 1.5 && n < 1.75) return 'volatility150';

  if (n >= 4) return 'volatilitymax';
  return '';
}
    const marketVolatility = quote => {
  if (quote) {
    return getVolatilityTargeting(volatilityScore(quote));
  }

  return '';

    const calculateVolatility = (compositeHigh, compositeLow, financialPV) => (compositeHigh - compositeLow) / financialPV * 100
    const marketStatus = quote => {
  if (quote) {
    return getMarketStatus(calculateStatus(quote.lastPrice, quote.previousPriceValue));
  }

  return '';
}
    const getMarketStatus = n => {
  if (n > 0) return 'green';

  if (n < 0) return 'red';

}
    const calculateStatus = (currentMarket, openingMarket) => (currentMarket - openingMarket) / openingMarket

      try {
        const res = await fetch(
          "https://api.wsj.net/api/dylan/quotes/v2/comp/quoteByDialect?needed=Trading&id=INDEX/US//DJIA&dialect=charting&ckey=57494d5ed7&EntitlementToken=57494d5ed7ad44af85bc59a51dd87c90&maxInstrumentMatches=1&accept=application/json"
        );
        const quoteData = await res.json();

        const instrumentData = quoteData.InstrumentResponses?.[0];
        if (instrumentData.Matches?.length < 1) return [];
        const matchData = instrumentData.Matches?.[0];

        const {
          Trading: {
            Last: { Price: { Value: lastPrice } } = {},
            Open: { Value: previousPriceValue } = {},
            High: { Value: highValue } = {},
            Low: { Value: lowValue } = {},
          } = {},
        } = matchData;

        if (!lastPrice || !previousPriceValue || !highValue || !lowValue) return [];

        const quote = {
          highValue,
          lastPrice,
          lowValue,
          previousPriceValue
        };

        const marketVol = [marketVolatility(quote), marketStatus(quote), volatilityScore(quote)]; //e.g [volatility050,green,0.6255902687930917]
        window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData', [{alert: marketVol.join()}])
      } catch (error) {
        console.log(error);
      }
    }

    function setMarketVolatility() {
      try {
        if (!false) getDJIA();
        else {
          window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData', [{alert: 'null'}]);
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.log(error);
      }
    }

    function deferredPromise() {
      let _resolve;
      let _reject;

      const promise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        _resolve = resolve;
        _reject = reject;
      });

      promise.resolve = _resolve;
      promise.reject = _reject;

      return promise;
    }

    /**
     * Make a request to get the entitlements of the current user
     */
    async function requestEntitlements() {
      window.entitlementsAsyncData = deferredPromise();

      // Set cxense async init
      window.__cxdj_init = deferredPromise();

      // Get entitilements (user data)
      const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      const hasAdPageType = false;
      const isHomepage = 'article' === 'desktophomepage' || 'article' === 'mobilehomepage';
      const isL1orL2 = 'article' === 'autofeed' || 'article' === 'hightouch';
      const isSnippetView = 'true' === 'true';
      window.__isSnippetView = isSnippetView;

      const targeting = {
        msrc: queryParams.get('mod') || '',
        application_stack: "gcn",
        breakpoint: "at16units",
        page: "article",
      };

      if (hasAdPageType) {
        targeting.pagetype = '';
      }

      const entitlementsUrl = 'https://www.wsj.com/client';
      const encryptedDocumentKey = 'bDZJzaq4/XCuR8G+DkPucSWa7bxOtTtozoGlUhfIKrN5l6xcuY33ynkpVgJu6AphzSl0T5Ijf+ob0rWPsTduw4H9OgVxV/KKVnYLuTXrvrGzTSc9sP1bB+O14mrcUSO7/4FL1WcB+Sd3N2pv/Opl8RXtsxCnXPidEZsR5oEHsf25TJ41guBBWFVLi5JMJpswKx5xuEWXjx8ZF0+q3C4Yf3fjzCrpKqvxSAu8VtzXcjVB86/SbGc5AmGbp/sfdw==';

      if (true) {
        performance.mark('client-request-entitlements');
        getCurrentUser(entitlementsUrl, encryptedDocumentKey);
      }

      const retrievedUser = await window.entitlementsAsyncData;
      await yieldToMain();
      performance.mark('ads-receive-entitlements');

      if (retrievedUser.redirect) {
        window.location.href = retrievedUser.redirect;
        return;
      }

      const {
        companyDetails: { company_codes: companyCodes, name: companyName = '' } = {},
        documentKey,
        execEdition,
        experience,
        tags,
        type,
        vxid,
        paywall,
        permissions: { wsjPausedSub } = {},
        emailHashes,
        profiles
      } = retrievedUser || {};

      if (window.newrelic) {
        if (window?.requestIdleCallback) {
          window.requestIdleCallback(() => {
            newrelic.setCustomAttribute('user-type', type);
          });
        } else {
            await yieldToMain();
            newrelic.setCustomAttribute('user-type', type);
        }
      }

      // Set emailHashes property in DL and call Liveramp via GMS
      if(emailHashes){
        window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData',[{emailHashes}]);
        await yieldToMain();
        window.__ace('liveramp','setEmailHashes',[emailHashes]);
        await yieldToMain();
      }

      if(!isHomepage && !isL1orL2){
        window.utag_data.cx_shield = paywall;
      }

      const userTargeting = {
        circ: type,
        // AdTech renamed circ to usertype in data layer
        usertype: type
      };

      window.utag_data.profiles = profiles || '';
      window.utag_data.user_exp = experience || '';
      window.utag_data.user_ref = (vxid && `V2-${vxid}`) || '';
      window.utag_data.user_tags = (tags && tags.join) ? tags.join(',') : '';
      window.utag_data.user_type = type || '';

      if (!isHomepage && !isL1orL2) {
        window.utag_data.article_template = !isSnippetView || documentKey ? 'full' : 'preview';
      }

      if (wsjPausedSub) {
        window.utag_data.sub_paused = 'true';
      }

      if (execEdition) {
        const companyId = (companyCodes && companyCodes.join('|')) || '';

        window.utag_data.company_id = companyId;
        window.utag_data.company_name = companyName;
        window.utag_data.page_site = 'WSJ Executive';
        window.utag_data.page_site_product = 'WSJEXEC';
        window.utag_data.page_content_region = 'Global';
      }

      try {
        await yieldToMain();
        window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData',[{...targeting, ...userTargeting}]);
      } catch(e) {}

    }

    requestEntitlements();
    if (window?.requestIdleCallback) {
      window.requestIdleCallback(()=>setMarketVolatility());
    } else {
      setTimeout(()=>setMarketVolatility(), 0);
    }

  })();
</script><script async="">
  (function() {

      djab_eventQueue = [];

      function handleOptimizelyMetric(metric){
        if (typeof metric === 'object'){
          if (window.optimizelyEdge){
            window.optimizelyEdge.push(metric);
          } else {
            djab_eventQueue.push(metric);
          }
        }
      }

      function handleQueuedOptimizelyMetrics(){
        let len = djab_eventQueue.length;
        while (len--) {
            if (typeof djab_eventQueue[len] === 'object'){
              window.optimizelyEdge.push(djab_eventQueue[len]);
            }
        }
      }

      window.djab_handleOptimizelyMetric = handleOptimizelyMetric;
      window.djab_handleQueuedOptimizelyMetrics = handleQueuedOptimizelyMetrics;
      performance.mark('djab-available-metricHandler');

  })();

    function loadCSS(href, before, media) {
      var ss = window.document.createElement("link");
      var ref = before || window.document.getElementsByTagName("meta")[0];
      var sheets = window.document.styleSheets;
      ss.rel = "stylesheet";
      ss.href = href.trim();
      ss.media = "only x";
      ref.parentNode.appendChild(ss, ref);
      function toggleMedia() {
        var defined;
        for (var i = 0; i < sheets.length; i++) {
          if (sheets[i].href && sheets[i].href.indexOf(href.trim().substr(-8)) > -1) {
            defined = true;
          }
        }
        if (defined) {
          ss.media = media || "all";
        }
        else {
          setTimeout(toggleMedia);
        }
      }

      toggleMedia();
      return ss;
    }

    window.loadCSS = loadCSS;
    </script><script>
    function loadJs(src) {
      var ref = window.document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
      var script = window.document.createElement("script");
      script.src = src;
      script.defer = 1;
      ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script, ref);
      return script;
    }
    window.loadJs = loadJs
    </script><script>
    function whenAvailable(name, callback, ms) {
      const interval = ms ? ms : 15; // ms
      var timeout = window.setTimeout(function () {
        if (window[name]) {
          window.clearTimeout(timeout);
          callback(window[name]);
        } else {
          window.setTimeout(arguments.callee, interval);
        }
      }, interval);
    }
    window.whenAvailable = whenAvailable;
    </script><script>
  (() => {
    if (PerformanceObserver && window.newrelic) {
      const observer = new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
        const entries = list.getEntries();
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.entryType === 'mark') {
            if (["ads-receive-entitlements","userprovider-receive-entitlements","userprovider-set-entitlements","client-request-entitlements","cx-candybar-onload","djab-available-optimizelyEdge","optimizely:blockBegin","playerLoadStart","playerReady","playerDisplayed","wsj_cxense_snippet"].includes(entry.name)) {
              if (window.requestIdleCallback) {
                requestIdleCallback(() => {
                  newrelic.setCustomAttribute(entry.name, Math.round(entry.startTime));
                });
              } else {
                newrelic.setCustomAttribute(entry.name, Math.round(entry.startTime));
              }
            }
          } else if (entry.entryType === 'measure') {
            if (["Next.js-before-hydration","Next.js-hydration","Next.js-render","Next.js-route-change-to-render"].includes(entry.name)) {
              if (window.requestIdleCallback) {
                requestIdleCallback(() => {
                  newrelic.setCustomAttribute(entry.name, Math.round(entry.duration));
                });
              } else {
                newrelic.setCustomAttribute(entry.name, Math.round(entry.duration));
              }
            }
          }
        });
      });
      try {
        observer.observe({ type: 'mark', buffered: true });
        observer.observe({ type: 'measure', buffered: true });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Buffered PerformanceObserver Not Supported', error)
      }
    }
  })();
  (()=> {
    let highestInp = 0;
    const observer = new PerformanceObserver((list, obs, options) => {
      for (let entry of list.getEntries()) {
        if (!entry.interactionId) continue;
        const duration = Math.round(entry.duration);
        if (duration <= highestInp) continue;
        highestInp = duration;
        const startTime = Math.round(entry.startTime);

        let label = entry.target?.ariaLabel?.replaceAll(" ", "_");
        label = label ? label : entry.target?.localName;
        let selector = entry.target?.classList?.value?.replaceAll(" ", "_");
        if (!selector) {
          selector = entry.target?.parentElement?.ariaLabel?.replaceAll(" ", "_") || entry.target?.href?.baseVal;
        }
        if (!label || !selector) {
          // likely video
          label = label ? label : window.utag_data?.user_type;
          const hasVideo = document.querySelector('[data-type="video"]')
          selector = selector ? selector : hasVideo ? 'video' : 'no-video';
        }
        const target = label + ':' + selector;
        if (window.newrelic) {
          if (window.requestIdleCallback) {
            requestIdleCallback(() => {
              newrelic.setCustomAttribute('inpSlowEventTarget', target);
              newrelic.setCustomAttribute('inpSlowEventStartTime', startTime);
            });
          } else {
            newrelic.setCustomAttribute('inpSlowEventTarget', target);
            newrelic.setCustomAttribute('inpSlowEventStartTime', startTime);
          }
        }
      }
    });
    try {
      observer.observe({
        type: 'event',
        durationThreshold: 200, // good INP is under 200ms
        buffered: true
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('PerformanceObserver failed', error)
    }
  })()
</script></body></html>

readabilityObject.title: The Big AI Question: Are You Ready to Pay for It?
readabilityObject.content:
The tech industry has a new strategy for getting us to upgrade our aging devices: artificial intelligence.

Much of the industry’s revenue depends on us buying the newest thing as often as possible. But for years, the gap between cutting-edge devices and older versions has shrunk, prompting both consumers and businesses to hold on to them longer than ever. The average replacement time for phones has grown to three years, laptops to four, and desktops to more than six.

1.caption: Microsoft last month unveiled a PC that has generative artificial intelligence tools built directly into Windows.

author.name: Christopher Mims
author.description: Christopher Mims is a columnist who writes about technology for The Wall Street Journal's tech bureau in San Francisco. The subjects of his columns vary widely from one week to the next. He has written about bidets, brain implants, the cult of the founder, the history of technology, innovation, venture capital, robotics, batteries, energy, materials science, wireless communications, AI, data science, telepresence, microchips, logistics, IT, 3D printing and autonomous boats, trucks, cars, drones and flying taxis. Christopher joined the Journal from Quartz, where he also covered technology. He has won a Sabew award for commentary, and has written a book, “Arriving Today” on how supply chains work.
